content: this **ugly christmas sweater ornament** is a fun little make that you can use as a christmas tree decoration or as a gift tag or to make garlands magnets keychains etc **materials** 2 5-mm c/2 usa 12 uk hook 3 5-mm e/4 usa 9 uk hook sport weight yarn fine 2 in two or more contrasting colors i used schachenmayr catania ten stitch markers tapestry needle scissors **size & gauge** this pattern is too small to accurately determine the gauge however when using the indicated yarns and hooks you should get a sweater of 2 25 6 cm by 4 10 cm **how much yarn will you need ** for this pattern you will need approximately 18-20 yards 15-17 5 m of yarn of which about 8-9 yds in color 1 and 11-12 yds in color 2 **yarn alternatives** for your ugly christmas sweater crochet ornament you can use really any yarn you have in your stash and actually this is the perfect pattern to use up some scrap yarn all you have to do is to choose the appropriate hooks for the yarn you have for example using **dk yarn** and 3 5 mm and 4 0 mm crochet hooks will result in a sweater of ~3 7 5 cm by 5 13 cm **construction** this pattern is written in three sections the collar the body and the sleeves the sweater is crocheted top-down mostly using v-stitches **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
